label: Basic Settings
description: Basic settings let you set player name, version, entry, and more.

children.label: Player Name
children.helpnote: Add a unique name for the new player

children.label: Player Version
children.helpnote: Select a TV Platform Player version - latest or beta. Beta allows you to experiment with new functionalities that will be released in the next version. Latest will always update to the latest version unless you select “Keep Player on Current Version“

children.label: Keep Player on Current Version
children.helpnote: Prevents the player from automatically updating when a new version becomes available

children.label: Select a Preview Video
children.helpnote: Select a video entry to preview with the new player

children.label: Apply user preferences
children.helpnote: Apply settings previously set by the user

children.label: Captions default display
children.helpnote: This is the default captions language. Off will not show captions at all. Auto will use the user set preferences from local storage, browser language, or the default language. Explicit requires entering a language code

children.label: Language key
children.helpnote: Deafult captions language

children.label: Enable CVAA
children.helpnote: Display captions styling menu on the player

children.label: Quality Selector
children.helpnote: Enables users to select the video bitrate

children.label: Audio Track Selector
children.helpnote: Enables users to select the audio language

children.label: Preload
children.helpnote: Load the video asset automatically when the page loads

children.label: Autoplay
children.helpnote: Play the video automatically when the page loads

children.label: Start Playback Muted
children.helpnote: When playback begins, start video in muted mode

children.label: Fallback to Muted Autoplay
children.helpnote: Fall back to muted autoplay on browsers that block autoplay with sound

children.label: Redirect Manifest to External Streams
children.helpnote: Enable workaround for some user-agents that don't allow redirects after a successful CORS-preflight request

youbora.label: Youbora
youbora.description: A powerful intelligence analytics and optimization platform to deliver online TV-quality video experiences. For full options see Here.

children.label: Account code
children.helpnote: Enter your Youbora account ID

googleAnalytics.label: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: Supports sending player analytics events to Google. For full configuration options see Google Analytics config file.

children.label: Google tracking code
children.helpnote: The Google tracking code i.e. UA-30164991-1

comscore.label: comScore
comscore.description:
Integrates comScore Streaming Tag data collection.
Please contact your comScore account team for complete instructions for using these parameters, which will be tailored to the needs of the reporting product you aim to collect data for.

children.label: Publisher ID
children.helpnote: A comScore-provided number with at least 7 digits that is unique for each Publisher. The Publisher ID is also known as the 'Client ID' or 'c2' parameter value

children.label: Label Mapping
children.helpnote: A comma-separated list of 'name=source' pairs where the source values will be retrieved each time the player changes media and included in data transmissions from the plugin

children.label: Persistent Labels
children.helpnote: A comma-separated list of 'name=value' pairs which will be treated as static values and included in all data transmissions from the plugin

ima.label: IMA
ima.description:
The Google IMA SDK for HTML5 V3 allows developers to request and track VAST ads in a HTML5 video environment. For full APIs see:
Google IMA HTML5 SDK APIs

children.label: Ad tag URL
children.helpnote: Enter a URL for the advertising tag

children.label: Loading Timeout
children.helpnote: Set the timeout for loading ads (in milliseconds). If an ad can’t be loaded within this timeframe, load the video automatically

children.label: HTML Companions
children.helpnote: For each companion ad, specify the container Div ID and expected ad width/height

label: 360 & VR
description: Play spherical 360 videos and immersive VR mode.

children.label: Toggle Stereo
children.helpnote: Whether to show the stereo toggle button (applicative to mobile devices)

children.label: Start In Stereo Mode
children.helpnote: Whether to start video with stereo mode

children.label: Move Multiplier
children.helpnote: Defines the sensitivity of the mouse and touch movement

children.label: Device Motion Multiplier
children.helpnote: Defines the sensitivity of the device motion

children.label: Camera frustum field of view
children.helpnote: Camera frustum vertical field of view, from bottom to top of view, in degrees

children.label: Camera frustum near plane
children.helpnote: Camera frustum near plane. The valid range is greater than 0 and less than the current value of the far plane

children.label: Camera frustum far plane
children.helpnote: Camera frustum far plane. The valid range is between the current value of the near plane and infinity

label: Advanced Settings
description: Edit your player’s configuration file using advanced settings. Recommended only for advanced player developers.
